creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: pounded brown cotton; top band has four 5" squares appliqued in red with white braid embroidered scrolls; similar center section with square at a diagonal; solid brown bottom section has smaller similar diagonal square in center; ties have blue insets; brown lining
title: Baby Carrier
